channel.title: Mediagazer
channel.description: Top news and commentary for media professionals from all around the web

item.title: クルド人支配下のシリアで活動していた英国人ジャーナリストが8月、ルートン空港で警察に5時間拘束されたが逮捕されず（Dan Sabbagh/The Guardian）
item.description:
Dan Sabbagh / The Guardian:
A British journalist who previously worked in Kurdish-controlled Syria was held by police at Luton airport for five hours in August without being arrested  —  Matt Broomfield, who has worked in Kurdish-controlled north-east Syria, had his phone and laptop seized when he was questioned last month

item.title: ガーディアン紙がデジタル版欧州版を創刊、「世界の問題に欧州の視点を」提供、英、米、豪、海外に次ぐ第5版（ガーディアン紙）
item.description:
The Guardian:
The Guardian launches a digital Europe edition to offer “a European lens on world issues”, the fifth edition after the UK, the US, Australia, and international  —  Expanded presence to showcase original journalism and highlight issues that matter to European readers

item.title: BBCの "機関紙 "として100年前に創刊されたラジオ・タイムズは、現在も "高収益 "を維持している。同誌はウェブサイト、アプリ、週刊ポッドキャストも提供している（Charlotte Tobitt/Press Gazette）
item.description:
Charlotte Tobitt / Press Gazette:
Radio Times, started 100 years ago as the BBC's “official organ”, remains “highly profitable”; the magazine also offers a website, an app, and a weekly podcast  —  One hundred years on, the Radio Times print magazine continues to be the highly profitable “mothership” …

item.title: マイケル・ウルフの新著『The Fall』：The End of Fox News and the Murdoch Dynasty（フォックス・ニュースの終焉とマードック王朝）』によれば、2022年、ルパート・マードックは7億8750万ドルのドミニオン訴訟でフォックスは5000万ドル損すると考えていた（Martin Pengelly/The Guardian）。
item.description:
Martin Pengelly / The Guardian:
Michael Wolff's new book, The Fall: The End of Fox News and the Murdoch Dynasty, says in 2022, Rupert Murdoch thought $787.5M Dominion suit would cost Fox $50M  —  Trump tell-all author returns with tale of Fox News strife which also includes prediction Ron DeSantis will be Republican nominee

item.title: パラマウントは、J:COMとWowowのオンデマンドサービスに追加する形で、12月1日から日本でParamount+を開始する予定（Patrick Brzeski/The Hollywood Reporter）
item.description:
Patrick Brzeski / The Hollywood Reporter:
Paramount plans to launch Paramount+ in Japan on December 1 as a free-of-charge addition to the on-demand services of local operators J:COM and Wowow  —  The deal will give Japanese subscribers to J:COM and Wowow access to Paramount+ content as a free-of-charge add-on.

item.title: Skyは、政府が計画しているTVトレンドの見直しに先立ち、クリエイティブ・セクターを阻害する恐れのある規制上のお役所仕事に取り組むよう英国政府に要請した（Daniel Thomas/Financial Times）。
item.description:
Daniel Thomas / Financial Times:
Sky calls on the UK government to tackle regulatory red tape that threatens to stifle the creative sector, ahead of a planned government review of TV trends  —  Broadcaster says ‘significant amounts’ of resources deal with regulatory requirements  —  UK-based broadcaster Sky has called …

item.title: 提出書類ディズニーは今後10年間でパークとクルーズラインに600億ドルを費やす計画で、過去10年間の投資額のほぼ倍増となる。
item.description:
Axios:
Filing: Disney plans to spend ~$60B in the next 10 years on its parks and cruise line segments, nearly doubling the investment it has made over the past decade  —  Disney plans to nearly double its investments in its popular theme parks and cruise line, the company said in a securities filing Tuesday.

item.title: 情報筋ソニーグループ、エミリー・ラタコウスキーのポッドキャストをキャンセルし、ポッドキャスト部門のスタッフを解雇。
item.description:
Ashley Carman / Bloomberg:
Sources: Sony Group cancels Emily Ratajkowski's podcast and lays off podcast unit staff; spokesperson: cuts involved a “significant percentage of the division”  —  - Company's podcast group is hit with third round of layoffs  — Decision to cut staff and shows follows industry contraction

item.title: 175人以上の作家、ミュージシャン、その他クリエイティブな分野の人々が、リーディング・レインボーのルヴァー・バートンが主導する、学校での図書禁止に反対する公開書簡に署名（Abbey White/The Hollywood Reporter）
item.description:
Abbey White / The Hollywood Reporter:
Over 175 writers, musicians, and others in creative fields sign an open letter against book bans in schools, in an effort led by Reading Rainbow's LeVar Burton  —  “It's only a matter of time before regressive, suppressive ideologues will shift their focus toward other forms of art and entertainment …

item.title: ラスベガス・レビュー・ジャーナルの記者とその同僚は、イーロン・マスクを含むユーザーが死亡ひき逃げ事件に関する彼女の報道を歪曲したことで、ソーシャルメディア攻撃に直面した（Angela Fu/Poynter）
item.description:
Angela Fu / Poynter:
A Las Vegas Review-Journal reporter and her colleagues faced social media attacks when users, including Elon Musk, distorted her coverage of a fatal hit-and-run  —  The Las Vegas Review-Journal is facing a harassment campaign stoked by Elon Musk, one year after a reporter was killed for his coverage.

item.title: WBDは10月5日、米国でマックス・ライブ・スポーツ・ティア「Bleacher Report Sports」を月額9.99ドルで追加する予定。
item.description:
Emma Roth / The Verge:
WBD plans to add a Max live sports tier, Bleacher Report Sports, in the US on October 5 for $9.99/month, or free for current subscribers until February 29, 2024  —  Max, the streaming service owned by Warner Bros. Discovery, is adding a live sports tier in the US on October 5th.

item.title: カメルーンを拠点とする親ワグナー・グループのテレビ局「Afrique Média」のような現地ジャーナリストやメディアを通じて、ロシアがアフリカで親クレムリン・メッセージを広める方法（Gretel Kahn/Reuters Institute）
item.description:
Gretel Kahn / Reuters Institute:
How Russia spreads pro-Kremlin messages in Africa through local journalists and media outlets like Afrique Média, a Cameroon-based, pro-Wagner Group TV channel  —  This Cameroon-based outlet reaches millions through linear TV and boasts over one million followers on their social channels

item.title: オンタリオ州で最も長い歴史を持つ新聞のひとつ、ハミルトン・スペクテイター紙が10月に廃刊する予定である。
item.description:
Bobby Hristova / CBC News:
The Hamilton Spectator, one of Ontario's longest-running newspapers, plans to close its office in October; last week, Torstar's owner Nordstar cut 605 staff  —  Meanwhile, several area weeklies are going online only and their reporters will be let go  —  The Hamilton Spectator is losing …

item.title: 10年ぶりにTechCrunchのEICを退任したマシュー・パンザリーノに、サイトのシリコンバレーとの関係、メディアの未来などについてQ&A（Nilay Patel/The Verge）
item.description:
Nilay Patel / The Verge:
Q&A with Matthew Panzarino, who recently stepped down as TechCrunch EIC after 10 years, on the site's Silicon Valley relationship, the future of media, and more  —  It's been a rocky and chaotic decade — and now digital media is on the brink of yet another existential crisis thanks to generative AI.

item.title: Platformer』3年間のハイライト：無料購読者数7万5,000人未満から1年で15万5,355人へ、広告の実験計画、読者の〜95％は有料ではない、など（Casey Newton/Platformer）
item.description:
Casey Newton / Platformer:
Highlights from three years of Platformer: from <75K free subscribers to 155,355 in a year, plans to experiment with ads, ~95% of readers do not pay, and more  —  Has the Substack revolution come and gone?  PLUS: What's changing in year four  —  I. State of the union
